v8:item.v8:content: Email address in the following format: user@server
Email account recipient. Messages will be sent on his behalf. For example, "John Doe".
User name for access to email (login)
User name for additional authentication on SMTP server
User name for additional authentication at SMTP server
Number of days to keep messages on server. Calculated as the difference between the current date and the posting date.
Use the account for sending emails
Use the account for receiving emails
Incoming mail protocol: POP or IMAP.
Use secure connection for incoming mail
Use secure connection for outgoing mail
Use safe logon to incoming mail server
Use encryption at data authentication on the server
Use safe logon to outgoing mail server
Use encryption at data authentication on the server
Select this check box if the SMTP authentication for server required a successful connection to POP3 server.
Delete include user name in view
